statements: UPDATE users SET age=30, gender='Male' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE users SET location='New York', interests='Coding, Cooking' WHERE email='john.doe@example.com';

UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value='dark theme' WHERE user_id=2 AND preference_id=1;

UPDATE users SET gender = 'Female', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE username = 'Alice';
UPDATE users SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 1001;
UPDATE content_recommendations SET recommendation_text = 'New content recommendation', recommendation_date = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE recommendation_id = 2002;

UPDATE user_profiles SET location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 2

UPDATE content SET author = 'John Doe' WHERE content_id = 'xyz789';

UPDATE recommendations SET score=4.5, recommended_date='2023-01-15' WHERE user_id='987e6543-21b1-43c5-a987-123456789012' AND content_id='876e5432-90a0-21b5-c678-210987654321';
